page.title: 15A day in the life of a child
page.content: Life Styles: I awoke at 6:15 and read a book. At 7:15 I went down to break- fast. We finished at 7:45 and went up stairs to get changed.I went to school at 8:50 and played on the computer. After assembly I sat down at my table and did my English. During playtime I played football with my friends.We had "Music workshop"until 11:30, then we talked about the "Domesday project".At 12:00 we all had our school dinner or sandwiches.At 12:30 I played football. At 13:00 we continued education with sewing or pottery. At 14:15 I played football. At 15:30 I went back home and practised my piano and violin. At 16:15 I watched the T.V.Tea was eaten at 17:15. Dad came home at 18:00. Then I played cricket with him. I watched T.V. again, then at 22:10 I went to bed.
